title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on Belichick Brilliance, Mahomes Roller Coaster, LeBron/Lakers Struggles
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on Belichick Brilliance, Mahomes Roller Coaster, LeBron/Lakers Struggles
description:
Colin uses Bill Belichick and Nick Saban to push back on the haters bashing the recent college coaching moves (3:00), and looks at which new CFB coaching hire has the biggest challenge ahead. Then, Nick Wright (co-host of FS1's "First Things First") joins to discuss Colin's theory on relationships and what it means for Mac Jones and the Patriots (8:00), what the Patriots win over the Bills showed us about Bill Belichick's mentality (13:00), why Patrick Mahomes looks so different this season (18:00), what the Bills should learn from the Patriots (26:00), why Belichick and Saban have the best coaching staffs (32:00), why LeBron is having so much trouble getting the Lakers to click (41:00), and why Damian Lillard teaming up with Ben Simmons might be a terrible idea (46:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
